overview: BigIndianWedding.com aims to simplify the wedding planning process by researching and mapping out the best possible vendors from their thirty one listed categories. You can be your own wedding planner with the help of our own complete information on Indian wedding cards, venues, decorations, flowers, lehengas, sarees, and dresses, make up, jewellery, caterers, or wedding planners. Number one portal for wedding planning, BigIndianWedding.com has more than five thousand four hundred listed vendors.
